{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12201v1", "title": "A combinatorial genesis of the right-angled relations in Artin's
  classical braid groups", "summary": "We show that the fundamental group of unlabelled configuration spaces of
thick particles in either a width-2 infinite strip or a width-2 rectangle are
right-angled Artin groups capturing the right-angled essence of Artin's braid
groups.", "main_category": "math.AT", "categories": "math.AT", "published": "2025-04-16T15:51:46Z"}
